document.discussion_title: Water project would restrict property owners land use
document.topic_text: Water project would restrict property owners land use Source: The Pocono Record April 25, 2016 at 10:33 AM If Nestle's water extraction project goes forward, surrounding homeowners and businesses will fall under new restrictions, onerous procedures or outright prohibitions for things like septic tanks, propane storage and agricultural operations. Continue reading You May Have Missed...
